website_summaries.verdict: Safe choice for kids and teens seeking control, stability, and support.
pros: Wide deck provides ample comfort and makes carving and turning easy
Smart sensors detect starts and stops
Ability to lock in a set speed, up to 9.2 mph
Functions as a regular skateboard when out of battery

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for teen
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a early Christmas gift for my kid and he loved it. It is more simple than other model I found and also cheaper too. I had my husband tried who weight like 190 and still work just not as fast when my kid play with it. Hope it can set a speed limit but over all it feel very durable and battery least a good amount of time for my kid play in the park, and he is able to carry it himself when he is done as well. It is very small but wider than normal board in case people is interested to know.
customer_reviews.author: wowl0ol

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good way to get around
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would be able to use this, but it ended up being my wife's. I discovered that I am way too big to use this, but it is the perfect size for her. She was able to get it working right away, and had tons of fun. The battery lasts for quite a while and it seems to go pretty fast. I think this is a good option for kids or women, since the maximum weight is 150 lbs and I am definitely going to trust that number.
customer_reviews.author: dark eegan

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not good for commuting
customer_reviews.text: It's fun to ride however it's not great for commuting. I originally got this to get to class but I find it easier to just walk. I recommend riding it on flat surfaces because if u go down hill it holds it at that speed and is hard to stop. Also the faster it goes the harder it is to control cause the trucks r loose meanings it's easy to turn so the faster u go the harder it is to keep it straight and in control
customer_reviews.author: Haley F

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this board.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter and she loves it. She just popped on the board then off she went (she's used to riding a penny board). The rainbow back light is really cool, and the beep lets us pedestrians know that there is something about to happen that we should be aware of. As a first dip of the toe into electric skateboards, this was a total win. It was definitely worth the money to extend her range (board can get her to more bus routes, increasing her level of mobility & freedom to explore without begin dependent on others for transportation). It shortened her college commute to about 10 minutes (from 30 min walk).
customer_reviews.author: Amber Worth

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Litterally useless tried different variations and styles of riding to no avail i then hold the semsors and spun the wheel and barely rotated not worth it at all sad to say, ihad very high hopes
customer_reviews.author: zach ogez

customer_reviews.title: Battery died -- and not recharging after minimal use
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Christmas -- he tested it a few times in Jan/Feb but really started using it around Mid March. Charged it every night. Worked for a few days and now won't charge at all. Tried a bunch of different outlets in the house so we know that's not the problem.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Bussler

customer_reviews.title: Capacity for beginner skateboarders
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for the 7 to 11 year old kids starting out. It's in second season use as I write this and the twins are 80+ pounds each and having a great time dodging the melting snow. For anyone larger or more familiar I recommend the more powerful expensive machines.
customer_reviews.author: Larry McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip for it's smaller size. It is awesome! My son loves it. It fit in his carry on (you have to because of the battery), and he road it everywhere. It really moves too. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.G

customer_reviews.title: Be careful.
customer_reviews.text: The board was very cool and nice design. It charges easy, and it's easy to learn. However; I know it is technically supposed to be a carving board but the front trucks were too loose. The front of the board kept turning eveytime I would kick off. I had to keep my opposite foot directly above it for the board to stay straight. It was too loose to the point that the front wheels broke after two rides. It's a good board but the material it's made out of could be better. Shotty manufacturing ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Lorens Rosarion

customer_reviews.title: Electric skateboard
customer_reviews.text: School electric skateboard with a feeling of use,yes right,it is an electric skateboard,but it is different from other electric skateboard,it is more like an ordinary skateboard,you need if you kick back,it will automatically glide forward,if you feel powerless,kick again and move forward,it not only saves effort,but also learns to control it yourself,it also has a flashing colored taillight,so perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Love the led light
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this for my son I did not realize it has an led light strip in the back which is a cool feature. It seems to work well, the kids enjoy riding it. The charge only seems to last about an hour but I believe it is a good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: It is fun to ride this skateboard
customer_reviews.text: This skateboard looks cool. It is smaller than regular skateboard but it is still big enough to step on it. The power makes it fun to ride (but don’t expect it to be a commuter tool). I love this skateboard.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Hill Rock

customer_reviews.title: A new favorite
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this skateboard. It allows the kids to more easily learn to balance on the skateboard as they don't have to have all of the focus on keeping it moving. The kids love the lights on it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Trundle

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The bottom cracked in 2 months. Company deadbeat won't back 90 day warranty.
customer_reviews.author: C. Duggan

customer_reviews.title: No remote control.
customer_reviews.text: It is my fault that I did not check more carefully, but this skateboard did not come with a remote control. My grandson was disappointed with the gift.
customer_reviews.author: sassycat

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant color
customer_reviews.text: This skateboard is electric and fast. It's bright color shines under the sunlight's. It work when it's out of battery which is a plus. The sound of the wind brushing by when riding it is satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Great board: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Hi, my name is maurice Grimsley. This electric skateboard is only 100.00 Its very good for price and speed and quality. Speed 9/10 -sometimes you can step wrong on paddles Quality/durability- 10/10 good strength and good quality along with the grip take. Smooth turns too. All in all I love this and I recommend this product. If @Swagatron wants me to do a unboxing for another board message me at reesegsr@outlook.com ❤
customer_reviews.author: Maurice G

customer_reviews.title: Slow bearings
customer_reviews.text: So I've been a skater since I was 11 years old so once I bought the eborad I had the feeling it was going to fast but apon closer inspection I learned the bearing were absolutely tearable so I put andele pro rate bearings in place of the stock bearings and it's so much faster smoother I recommend anybody who buys one of these skateboards also buy a set of really good prorate varying like I said the stock bearings are garbage
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Stockwell

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great skateboard for the kids. My daughter uses this all the time. She steps on, kicks off and it engages automatically. Holds a charge for a long time. Loves the dancing lights on the back of the board, especially when it’s dark outside.
customer_reviews.author: Deadpool

customer_reviews.title: Fun, great that this now exists
customer_reviews.text: Way fun, do need to be about 80 lbs to operate
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Griffin

customer_reviews.title: great design and good price
customer_reviews.text: This board has great design and good price, it's design to attract our eyes. so i bought it for my customer's boy . This isn't his first skateboard, my customer sent message to me, she is very happy,her son got amazing experience with this board, it works great! Thank you! great product.
customer_reviews.author: Na'trition

customer_reviews.title: Just right size for my boy
customer_reviews.text: It’s just right size for my boy. Very light weight but very sturdy, and beautiful colored. Just perfect, my boy like it so much. Now my boy have common ground with neighbors kids. His so happy.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's birthday and he loves it. Its winter and he hasn't taken it outdoors so far but has tried it in the basement and likes it a lot. Very good one for this price!!
customer_reviews.author: Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Electric Skateboard
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely loves this board, so does his dad! Lights up and powers off when not in use!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria E. Otto Worley

customer_reviews.title: Good for smaller kids too
customer_reviews.text: Was worried it would be too much for almost 2yo but with a little practice she's doing great on it. Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over rated
customer_reviews.text: Worked for less than 24 hours and back wheel stopped moving completely. Son was super sad and christmas gift had to be thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Kid!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old loves it and was quickly able to learn how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: I felt like it was fun for him and also safe.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson 10 y/o. He learned on it and liked it. I felt that if was s
customer_reviews.author: jeanette Jackci

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: So this thing legit is a lot of fun , doesn’t go that fast but better it doesn’t so you don’t hurt yourself. I’m 175 lbs purchased it to play in the street with kids . Love this thing
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Not what described...Amazon would only give 3 options to exchange it with
customer_reviews.text: Does not perform anything like the details there is no sustainable speed. Battery wouldn't even charge after a week.....Tried to exchange but Amazon app would only let me pick from 3 choice to exchange it with none anything I would want
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great product for teen!
customer_reviews.text: My 12yr old loves this electric skateboard. It goes pretty fast and he’ll ride it for hours.😍
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin Emfinger

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my son (10). He has a great time riding, the battery last a few days, the brakes work good and it goes a decent speed.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like. Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Did not work like description. I gifted to my son and he didn’t like the performance. He wanted to return but now our is amazon return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Jigar K Chokshi

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Received in timely manner. The skateboard is perfect for my 7 yr old. It’s fast enough and shuts off once he jumps off.
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, underpowered.
customer_reviews.text: Poor design. Low battery life, weak sensors for activation of motor and finally a horrifically underpowered motor. Even for a small child of the recommended size and weight this is not a good toy.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product For The Price
customer_reviews.text: My grandson really likes his Swagtron Swageskate..... we love the durability, quality, smooth quiet ride and turning ability. As well as the led lights to be seen at night while riding.
customer_reviews.author: Matresa C.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. It wasn’t too fast, she is 10, fast enough. Her friends all want one !
customer_reviews.author: bupswa

customer_reviews.title: Great board
customer_reviews.text: Made it before Christmas after I sent a message to the seller. Awesome customer service. The skateboard is great. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Rich. G.

customer_reviews.title: Great starter board
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter board. It can get very fast pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Harper

customer_reviews.title: Swagscate ng3
customer_reviews.text: It wouldn’t go up the smallest incline. Occasionally it will be hard to push and you may fall Ofer the front of the board.
customer_reviews.author: william t mchenry

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for a long time
customer_reviews.text: It was OK for the first month but later on it doesn’t work really well
customer_reviews.author: Max siliceo

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my 10 year old. Hope it's not to small.
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: It's a bad product. The motor can not start when you stand on the skateboard.
customer_reviews.text: It's a bad product. The motor can not start when you stand on the skateboard.
customer_reviews.author: David

product_meta.title: Swagtron Swagskate NG3 Electric Skateboard for Kids, Teens | Kick-Assist A.I. Smart Sensors | Mini E-Cruiser Skateboard w/Move-More/Endless Mode | 9” Deck 72mm Wheels (NG-3)
feature_bullets: Move more, kick less — kick-to-cruise locks in your current speed up to 9. 3 mph, so you can cut, Carve & Coast like a true skateboard Legend.
Powerfully responsive sensors — Intelligently placed sensors detect weight and motion, automatically stopping The board in seconds when you dismount.
Real feel skateboarding — the 72mm (2. 8 in) polyurethane wheels along with the Polypropylene deck have the flexibility to handle pavement like a Pro, absorbing the shocks from bumpier pavement.
Made for epic rides — from its first ride to its 1000Th, the Ng3 will look and perform pristine. Its 8. 9-Inch wide deck is crafted from super-dense Polypropylene that won’t wear, fade or crack.
World-class support — every Swagtron electric skateboard is backed by our expert team of support specialists, fully staffed in the U. S. And available by phone, email or live chat.
